ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the final stretch as the makeshift team of humans survivors and Alien scientists attempt to save what's left of humanity. But can they survive long enough to finish the job? The epic conclusion to Aliens Vs. Zombies is here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jason Metcalf & Victor Bartlett | Missing | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Sanju Nivangune | Missing | C | Cover C | Ed Anderson | Missing | D | Cover D | Giuseppe Cafaro & Alessia Nocera | Missing | Note: The digital edition (12/16/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
